question: In which year, the first edition of the Pro Kabaddi League was held?
explanation: In the year 2014, the first edition of the Pro Kabaddi League was held. The Pro Kabaddi League (PKL), is a professional-level Kabaddi league in India. It was launched in 2014. The league's inception was influenced by the popularity of the kabaddi tournament at the 2006 Asian Games. The format of the competition was influenced by the Indian Premier League.
